Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about the availability of a specific book title, author, or genre, including new releases, bestsellers, or hard-to-find books.
Common Inquiries: Book formats, Prices, In-store availability, Online availability, Delivery options

Call Type Description: Customers seeking personalized book recommendations based on their reading preferences, genre, or authors they enjoy.
Common Inquiries: Book genres, Author suggestions, Reading level, Age range, Top picks

Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about events, author readings, book clubs, or other programs hosted by the bookstore or library.
Common Inquiries: Event schedules, Author appearances, Book club meetings, Program registration, Venue information

Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about the return and refund policy for purchased books, including exchange options and store credit.
Common Inquiries: Return window, Refund process, Exchange options, Store credit, Gift receipts

Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about the status of their online or in-store book order, including tracking information and estimated delivery dates.
Common Inquiries: Order status, Tracking information, Delivery estimates, Shipping options, In-store pickup

Call Type Description: Customer outreach calls to notify them about new book releases, bestsellers, or staff picks that may be of interest.
Common Inquiries: Book releases, Bestseller lists, Staff picks, Author events, Pre-order options

Call Type Description: Calls to notify customers about ongoing promotions, discounts, or special offers on books, e-books, or audiobooks.
Common Inquiries: Discount codes, Sale dates, Bundle deals, Membership benefits, Loyalty rewards

Call Type Description: Calls to collect customer feedback and survey responses about their experience with the bookstore or library, including event participation and overall satisfaction.
Common Inquiries: Survey questions, Feedback forms, Event evaluations, Customer satisfaction ratings, Improvement suggestions

Call Type Description: Calls to invite customers to join book clubs, author readings, or other programs hosted by the bookstore or library.
Common Inquiries: Book club schedules, Author appearances, Program descriptions, Registration process, Membership benefits

Call Type Description: Calls to notify customers about loyalty program updates, rewards, or special offers based on their purchasing history and reading habits.
Common Inquiries: Loyalty rewards, Points redemption, Exclusive offers, Tier upgrades, Program benefits
